title: Cane cutters
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board, John Heyer and Hugh McInnes
brief_description: One of the “Interesting Australians” series which showed Australians at work. The first person, poetic commentary describes the life and work of cane cutters and celebrates their mateship and their sense of belonging to ‘the good earth of tropical Australia’.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian National Film Board, John Heyer and Hugh McInnes
